basics.name: Fintan Halpenny
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am an experienced software engineer with a strong emphasis on backend development. In the last 3 years I've worked on handling of market data, writing driver software and developing internal tools at SIG and building the improved logo detection stack from the ground up at LogoGrab, a Dublin-based startup. My tasks at LogoGrab involve writing functional style and efficient Python, C and Scala code, management of AWS deployments via OpsWorks, SQS and EC2, writing tools for automating work flow for AWS and providing support to our range of customers. I work best in teams that collaborate on projects and foster a positive workplace environment. As a team member, I enjoy work that not only challenges me, but also requires me to learn new things while refining the skills I already have.

work.summary: LogoGrab is the leading company in logo recognition with metrics that are three times higher than their closest competitors. The logo recognition technology is used for a range of use cases such as social media analysis and fraud detection.
highlights: Backend architecture for computer vision and machine learning pipeline, designing the processing pipeline from start to finish.
I designed the backend operations that concerned the logo detection engine. Some of these opetations included communication to the servers, health and monitoring and deployment of services.
I handle many of our AWS services for logo detection engines. These included: OpsWorks orchestration, real time streaming via SQS and database management using RDS
I am a key player when dealing with customers from a technical stand point. I was heavily involved in onboarding clients during testing and production phases.

I am the technical lead on the production phase of our counterfeit detection project with eBay. This involves working closely with eBay's counterfeit team, our account manager and managing our front end developers that build LogoGrab compliance tools.
In my spare moments I explore the use of Haskell as a language to interact and orchestrate our numerous cloud providers.

work.summary: SIG are one of the top trading companies, their European Headquarters in the heart of the financial district of Dublin.
highlights: C# tooling for overviewing batch jobs

awards.title: Victor W. Graham Prize
awards.summary: Highest grade in Mathematics, achieving 97% overall.

references.reference: References can be provided upon request
